triq(gm)qSattraya#Sca gaqNinO# ruqjantOq diva(gm)# ruqdrAH pRu#thiqvIM ca# sacantE | 
EqkAqdaqSAsO# aPsuqShada#H suqta(gm) sOma#M juShantAq(gm)q sava#nAyaq viSvE$ || 
uqpaqyAqmagRu#hItO-&syAgrayaqNO#&siq svA$grayaNOq jinva# yaqj~jaM jinva# yaqj~japa#timaqBi sava#nA pAhiq viShNuqstvAM pA#tuq viSaqM tvaM pA#hIndriqyENaiqSha tEq yOniqrviSvE$ByastvA dEqvEBya#H || 12
(triq(gm)qSattrayOq - dvica#tvAri(gm)Sat) (A11)
